author: Lon.TV
description:
See my ATSC 3 coverage: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D006HMr8TDs&list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP - Broadcast owner Nexstar is allegedly strong arming a local Ohio cable company according to an FCC complaint. The end result will be higher customer bills for channels they don't watch. See more commentary: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsJJ0Gy1ENvGjbCp7PslRyz and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

title: Here's Why Your Cable / Streaming TV Bills Keep Going Up
